website_summaries.verdict: Inspired by Puma's classic soccer silhouettes, the Astro Kick has that distinct appeal that does not wilt away despite the passing decades. It has a style which consumers have described as simply timeless.Furthermore, some users said the shoe felt good during for long walks and easily matched whatever outfit they have in mind. That said, there were some issues concerning arch support and break-in period. However, considering all its advantages and budget-friendly price, the Puma Astro Kick no doubt fits the bill.
pros: Most reviewers praise the Puma Astro Kick for its superb comfort
The price is very budget friendly
Many testers find the footbed to be well-padded and good for long walks
A handful of customers remark that the Puma Astro Kick’s retro styling remains timeless
Quite a handful of users gather lots of compliments while wearing the shoe
Several customers note that the shoe easily matches almost any casual wear
The Puma Astro Kick is of good quality, as reported by some users
cons: A couple of wearers are disappointed with the lack of arch support
The shoe fits tight and narrow, especially during the first week of wearing, according to a few buyers
At least one user has brought up that the tongue tends to slip to the side

customer_reviews.title: A little tight at first.
customer_reviews.text: They fit really narrow and they were really tight when I first put them on. But I wore them to the store and they loosened up and felt better. They come with a gel insert soul which I found comfortable for walking. I wear a 10 but ordered a 10.5 just to be sure but a 10 would have been fine as they have plenty of toe room.Not quite as stylish as the suede but still a bit of an eye catcher.
customer_reviews.author: A. S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, But Narrow!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking sneaker, extremely comfortable, too, but narrow. I ordered an 11.5, my usual size, but they were way too tight. I reordered a 12 and they’re better with plenty of toe space, but again, narrow. I wore them today and after two hours my right foot was aching. I took them off, loosened the laces, and although better, still not a perfect fit. I’m hoping after wearing them a few more times they’ll stretch some and be more comfortable. If not, perhaps my nephew can wear them.
customer_reviews.author: HouTXGuy

customer_reviews.title: Its a nice looking comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: A couple people have commented on my shoes since I bought these. They are fairly sharp looking shoes but not overly attention grabbing. I got a 1/2 size up from my normal shoe size (normally a 10.5, went to an 11) and they fit very comfortably. I work in an office and these are comfortable office shoes. I'm pretty happy with them. My only reservation is that the laces are pretty short.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron J. Mcintyre

customer_reviews.title: only one brand of sneakers as far as I'm concerned.
customer_reviews.text: Having worn PUMA sneakers for years, I find they are one of the few remaining brands that are 1: comfortable 2. well made 3. durable 4. reasonably priced 5. not overly ostentatious This is probably my fifth pair of PUMA sneakers over the past years and I return to this brand time and again because they are well made, hold up and most importantly, COMFORTABLE! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. R. lee

customer_reviews.title: These run wicked narrow
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, seems like decent quality. The toe of these things are like women's dress shoes though! I don't know whose foot tapers to a point at the toes, but mine does not. The soles are also very thin and you'll feel everything you step on. Had to return them as I couldn't find a wide option.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great looking Samba Puma’s
customer_reviews.text: This Puma shoe reminded me of high school. The Samba Puma’s. These are great looking shoes for casual and jeans with coat. Comfortable shoe and agile enough to kick a soccer ball like a champ. Love em!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Width is great, length too long
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look amazing for sure. Puma is my favorite brand by far. However, for whatever reason these shoes just didn't fit the same as with other puma suede shoes. There was a lot of space in the toe area. I got a size 10 which is what I always get with puma shoes. Unfortunately I had to return it, but I picked up another pair of puma classic suedes. Would have loved to have gotten the blue, gold, white color though.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, stylish, simple.
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe. It fits as expected is very stylish. Love the simplicity of the look (it's a classic). Highly recommend. Great tennis shoe for casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: no

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size but okay fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. He took them out the box and right away he said they looked long. Well he put them on and suddenly they didn't look so long. He said they were comfortable. After him wearing them twice. I noticed that they were not the size we ordered. It worked out okay. But be aware to check your size cause Amazon sent us 9.5. I checked my order and I ordered his size which is 9 But according to my husband it's ok. So no harm. And he said shoes felt very light on his feet ,he's happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ant

customer_reviews.title: Real Pumas?
customer_reviews.text: I question whether these were real Pumas. I've worn Pumas for decades and these did not feel like the same quality. It started falling apart within 30 days of buying.
customer_reviews.author: Kahaluu

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son for Christmas. He loves Puma and he loves these sneakers. I would say they run a little slim but it's not a problem for him as his feet are not wide.
customer_reviews.author: Joann D.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son. At first he didn't like the feel. But after he wore it and got it broke in, he loves them now. Great looking pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Luong

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of these, and I now wish I would have sent them back for a bigger size... Perhaps then they would be a little more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Alittle narrow but overall i knew id need to size up
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear size 12 shoes but knowlingly seeing how narrow these shoes are. I knew i would need to get size 13s and they were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: bwong247

customer_reviews.title: Way way way way way too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. No human with an 11 1/2 foot could possibly fit into this shoe. Ludicrously narrow. This shoe would not fit a 6 year old. I am not exaggerating. This is a disgrace. Puma should be ashamed.
customer_reviews.author: Gumball Popeye

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This Product I have been using for 6 months now. Feels comfortable when you walk. Most of the time I used to wear running shoes because I walk at least 4 hours daily. After purchasing this shoes my feet's felt very relaxed .
customer_reviews.author: Abdul Syed

customer_reviews.title: Love These Pumas!
customer_reviews.text: I got these at a great price, and I would have been happy to have paid a lot more. Style and comfort are unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: the briz

customer_reviews.title: very thin outer sole
customer_reviews.text: They look good. very little support. Good for going to the store, I think outdoor use will destroy the thin outer sole very fast. they also run narrow. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: goose

customer_reviews.title: When I return them for the larger size I would like to get the burgundy
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe Just didn’t fit forgot my shoe size but I’ve always liked the puma the puma Suede shoes
customer_reviews.author: R Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Fits same as nike awesome shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Fits same size as nike if anyone is wondering.. It's pretty narrow shoe like most classic pumas but fit me great the tongues are white and a leather material it looks dope didnt even notice it when i bought em great looking shoes will definitely get some other pairs in the future.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Not as
customer_reviews.text: Okay product ...does not fit as well are other puma sneakers I’ve had in the past

customer_reviews.title: Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow. My son's never had problems with shoes being this narrow in Vans or Nikes.
customer_reviews.author: GreenMango75

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. A little tight in the arch and a little loose in the heel but once you brake them in they're very comfortable. Survived a day of walking at Disneyland in these, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Needed a different size since these are mens shoes. Must use size chart to convert to womans size.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Wore these shoes daily for about 3 months and the ankle support are already falling apart. The original design of the pair that costs about $35 were a lot better, but cannot find them for sale anywhere. Highly disappointed with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Durable and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a previous fan of the Puma Super Liga. I was going through pairs every 3 months, and wanted something more durable. These shoes look and fit great, and are standing up to the test of time much better than the Super Ligas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Junk
customer_reviews.text: Cheap junk, shoes were falling apart right out of the box. Poor stitching and design.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Branigan

customer_reviews.title: Pefect puma kicks so soft
customer_reviews.text: Love how well the shoes fit. Wish i could buy more puma's.
customer_reviews.author: wesley

customer_reviews.title: No support. Not awesome
customer_reviews.text: No support. Cheap shoes. Look good. Dont expect comfort. It aint there.
customer_reviews.author: steve skaggs

customer_reviews.title: Greatly made &  comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Awesomeness! Bought 3 pair , well cause first 2 got stolen, but had to have them, love them
customer_reviews.author: Skyler Rebiejo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as described on Web
customer_reviews.text: TO re-ordered in the future. Since its the style and color that he likes.
customer_reviews.author: karina

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, but all pumas rub the top of my heel the wrong way until worn in. Have to wear mole skin in the meantime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are nice shoes but with anything Puma, they either run too narrow or small. This is the case with these shoes as they would not be suitable with someone who has wide feet. I like these shoes but just a tad bit too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Works great with the outfit that I have.I
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes, and they fit great, and are very comfortable. They match up with my gear nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Yarborough

customer_reviews.title: Durable and a great fit
customer_reviews.text: Was worried these wouldn't hold up with an active 12 year old wearing them, but they have made it through a couple months of hurricane Jackson and are still in great shape!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: The service is great i love amazon prime
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the shoes for my son and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: bettysales

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit, comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Fit true to size. Son says they are comfortable. Nicely made. Delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, good price, light and confortable
customer_reviews.text: Always liked the look of the black suede. Big fan of Adidas Gazelle which are expensive and really to come by. So for $40 I got the cool puma look and are very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: Customer service..... pffft!
customer_reviews.text: I'll let you know when I actually receive it. Absolute garbage customer service.
customer_reviews.author: hehehe

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe! Good look!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe. Fits well. Addidas has a similar shoe that I tried, but that ran narrow. Pumas get an A in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Muenster

customer_reviews.title: Good design and very light weight shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like this luxery black/white/gold design and light weight and simple shoes.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for comfort!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! My other indoor soccer shoes hurt my feet after a few hours. I can literally walk in them all day!

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Little snug in the toes but they broke in after about 3 days Love them!!! I work in a DIRTY ASS warehouse the trim stays white too i dig em 🤘🏽

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe very classy look!
customer_reviews.text: Overall love the shoe. Probably due to how I walk, but the tongue tends to move to the side. Which can be annoying.

customer_reviews.title: A hug for my feet

customer_reviews.title: nc
customer_reviews.text: Really like the look of this shoe a little tight but so far happy with this sneaker.

customer_reviews.text: I purchased these during Prime Day and I got a great deal, they are very comfortable and fit exactly as expected

customer_reviews.title: Little tight!!
customer_reviews.text: The product is ok not great little tight. But for the rest the material is good..

customer_reviews.text: Ive mailed the shoes back wrote on the package return and to small. So when r yall gone put the money back on my card.i mailed them back june 13

customer_reviews.title: It take few days to get used to

customer_reviews.title: perfect

customer_reviews.title: Great casual shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This is a comfortable, great looking, casual sneaker. Low cut and light.

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Astro Kick Sneaker
product_meta.description: The astro kick is a new football inspired cupsole trainer for all the football fans out there. The soft suede upper features football inspired deco stitching lines and a bold branded synthetic leather tongue inspired by the classic football silhouettes as well as a PUMA formstripe branding. The SoftFoam+ sockliner provides superior cushioning and optimal comfort for every step of your day. A clean and dressy football sneaker
